channel.title: [Minor, Glitch, DrawDist] Abnormally short draw distance on truck.
channel.description:
Hello,
Reporting a bug related to an abnormally short draw distance on a truck. The truck also has contents on top of it which have a standard draw distance, making them appear floating. Using the crossbow scope, even from outside of the drawdistance, still shows the truck.
Console position data:
map : bm_c2a3c at: -902 x, 649 y, 488 z
getpos setpos -902.753296 649.376831 488.031250;setang -5.95
Outside of draw distance, with scope:
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471988[/url]
Outside draw distance:
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471912[/url]
Phasing into draw distance:
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471855[/url]
In draw distance
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471791[/url]

item.title: [Minor, Glitch, DrawDist] Abnormally short draw distance on truck.
item.dc:creator: fritzpud
item.description:
Hello,

Reporting a bug related to an abnormally short draw distance on a truck. The truck also has contents on top of it which have a standard draw distance, making them appear floating. Using the crossbow scope, even from outside of the drawdistance, still shows the truck.

Console position data:

map : bm_c2a3c at: -902 x, 649 y, 488 z

getpos
setpos -902.753296 649.376831 488.031250;setang -5.95

Outside of draw distance, with scope:

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471988

Outside draw distance:

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471912

Phasing into draw distance:

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471855

In draw distance

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514471791

Read full topic
